welcome_message_body: Welcome to Puerto Iguazu! This charming city is known for its stunning waterfalls and lush rainforests. We invite you to explore and enjoy all the natural beauty and unique culture this vibrant destination has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cataratas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cataratas Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alejo Garcia Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Alejo Garcia Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport with a simple registration process.
